price: “Uzmi je i ne boj se!”, reče On, “Mi ćemo je vratiti u ono što je bila prije.
arabic: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf sanuʿīduhā sīratahā al-ūlā
